abstract: China tries Shawket and Rexim Hoshur, brothers of American Radio Free Asia journalist Shohret Hoshur, for endangering state security and leaking secrets; their fate looms over September summit between Pres Xi Jinping and Pres Obama.
lead_paragraph: A court in China’s western region of Xinjiang tried two brothers of an American reporter on charges of endangering state security and leaking secrets.

headline.main: China: Legal Ordeals for Brothers of a Journalist
headline.print_headline: Asia; China: Legal Ordeals for Brothers of a Journalist

snippet: A court in China’s western region of Xinjiang tried two brothers of an American reporter on charges of endangering state security and leaking secrets.
